duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct pediatric physical therapy assessments and develop personalized treatment plans for young patients.
Facilitate therapeutic exercises to improve motor function and mobility in pediatric patients.
Communicate and collaborate with patients and their families to ensure understanding and compliance with treatment plans.
Engage in child development activities to enhance physical, cognitive, and emotional well-being in young patients.
Work alongside a team of professionals to provide comprehensive care and support for pediatric patients.
Maintain accurate and detailed patient records, documenting progress and modifications in treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Doctorate in Physical Therapy (DPT) or equivalent degree, with specialized training in pediatric physical therapy.
